availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Oldham County, Kentucky, native. Married to Christiana Teague Sulivan in Trimble County on July 23, 1852. Father of William T. Sulivan, Mary E. Sulivan, and John R. Sulivan. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky Trimble County, p. 77.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994056, Trimble County Marriages, p. 1.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Graves County Deaths, File #11147.
